name: uncombed
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
Uncombed hair is untidy and has not been made smooth using a brush or comb (= a flat object with a thin row of long, narrow parts along one side): She wore no make-up and her hair was uncombed. He had tufts of uncombed hair poking through a baseball cap.
More examplesFewer examplesHis hair was rough and uncombed, and he had a bruise below his eye. Her long black locks were wild and uncombed.He was wearing a black felt hat that concealed some of his greying profusion of uncombed hair.
